articles.title: Ubisoft shows off opening hours of Immortals Fenyx Rising gameplay - TrueAchievements
articles.description: Ubisoft showed off some of the early hours of Immortals Fenyx Rising, which finds Fenyx tackling her mission to rescue the gods. You can get a glimpse at some of what the game has to offer in the new clip.
articles.content: Ready to get your hands on Immortals Fenyx Rising, but can't wait until the game debuts later this week? Ubisoft has sent a gift from the Greek gods themselves: the first hours of the game for your p… [+1275 chars]

articles.author: Ian Carlos Campbell
articles.title: Developers are emulating PS2 games on the Xbox Series S and X using RetroArch - The Verge
articles.description: You can now play older PlayStation games on a new Xbox Series X or S by adding the UWA version of emulation software RetroArch to your console in dev mode. The PlayStation 5 is only backwards compatible with the PS4, so this method opens up a way to play olde…
articles.content:
Play old PlayStation exclusives on your new Xbox
Photo by Tom Warren / The Verge
